node.content:
Camp Lebanon Retreat Center 4464
Emmons Rd, Oregonia, Ohio 45054
Check in on Friday, September 11th
from 3 pm to 8:30 pm
Check in on Saturday the 12th
from 7 am to 9:30 am
 
Please register for our event online at Ohiocmf.com
by September 3 so we can plan for food, but
gate registration will also be available.
Two day ticket price (Fri/Sat) = $50
One day ticket price (Sat) = $40
Cabins are available to stay in Friday, or you
can bring a tent or hammock if you’d prefer.
Featuring our guest speaker Dr. Mark Jackson,
the lead pastor of Towne Church in Middletown, Ohio
Also featuring our musical guests, Soul’d Out Quartet
----------------Page (0) Break----------------
Instagram @Ohio_Christian_mens_fellowship
Facebook @Ohio Christian Men’s Fellowship
Event Schedule:
Friday, September 11
- Registration from 3 pm to 8:30, campgrounds open
- Fishing tournament from 4 pm to 8 pm
- Bonfire and Fellowship and hot dog roast at 9 pm
Saturday, September 12
- Registration from 7 am to 9:30 am
- Breakfast from 8 am to 9:30 am
- Welcome Meeting at 9:30 am
- Singing and Worship Service from 9:45 am to 10:45 am
- “Devotion Sessions” from 11 am to 12 pm
- Lunch from 12 pm to 1:30 pm
- Fellowship and Rec from 12 pm to 4 pm
        - Activities include: Fishing, hiking, frisbee golf,
        basketball, paddle boating, and more.
        - Tournaments include: Corn hole from 12:30 pm to 2 pm
        and Horseshoes from 2:15 pm to 3:45 pm
- Sermon and Business from 4 pm to 5:30 pm
- Dinner from 5:30 pm to 6:30 pm
----------------Page (1) Break----------------

This year’s Special Offering 
will go to Camp Marengo 
Kitchen Equip. & Upgrade 
 
RETREAT PROGRAM 
FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 9 
  9:00 A.M. REGISTRATION OPENS 
  1:00 P.M. RECREATION BEGINS 
5:00 P.M. DINNER (open till 8:00 P.M.) 
  8:00 P.M. EVENING SERVICE 
Speaker: Rev. Mitchell Burch 
Music:  The Townesmen 
10:00 P.M. CAMPFIRES 
  A Time of Renewal, Reflection, 
  Testimony and Prayer 
11:00 P.M. FELLOWSHIP 
  Popcorn and Wiener Roast 
12:00 P.M. LIGHTS OUT--PLEASE 
 
 
SATURDAY, SEPTEMBER 10 
 6:30 to 8:30a      BREAKFAST   
  Chris Cakes (Flying Pancakes) 
 6:30 to  CHAPEL IS OPEN 
 8:30 A.M. For Personal Devotions  
9:30 A.M.  DONUTS 
10:00 A.M. Pre-service Activities  
Pavilion 
10:30 A.M. MORNING SERVICE 
Speaker:    Rev. Mitchell Burch 
  Music:  The Townesmen 
12:30 P.M. RECREATION 
12:30 P.M. OX-ROAST LUNCH 
  3:00 P.M. HOMEWARD BOUND 
SET THIS DATE ASIDE! 
 2017 Ox-Roast & Men’s  
Retreat 
42nd Annual Retreat 
Sept 8/9 
 
Retreat Speaker 
Eric Samuel Timm 
 
Music 
Soul’d Out Quartet 
PLEASE REMEMBER TO WEAR YOUR WRIST 
BAND.   
You MUST have a wrist band to eat 
If you have any suggestions for improve-
ments or changes, please be sure to let 
one of the council members know your 
thoughts! 
PRAYER CORNER HOURS 
Friday  5p—7p  
Saturday  8a—10a

siteMetadata.title: Ohio Christian Men's Fellowship
siteMetadata.description: An event in which Christian men gather in fellowship with one another to learn about Christ and His love for us. Register today to attend this event.
siteMetadata.keywords: jesus christ, christian mingle, ministry, church of christ, christ fellowship, fellowship church, bibleman, who is jesus christ, jesus is lord, spiritual retreats, fellowship one, christ fellowship church, christian missionaries, men's ministry, ministry of reconciliation, church ministry, men's retreat, christian retreat, outreach ministry, new life fellowship church, church, bible, bible verses, god, prayer, bible verse of the day, jesus christ, preacher, baptism, faith, books of the bible, psalm, catholic, miracle, church of jesus christ, jesus christ superstar, yahweh, bible quotes, pastor, the bible, holy spirit, bible study, salvation
